thread.title: IBERIABANK Corporation to Announce First Quarter Results and 2020 Strategic Goals

author: cnbc.com
title: IBERIABANK Corporation to Announce First Quarter Results and 2020 Strategic Goals
text:
LAFAYETTE, La., March 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- IBERIABANK Corporation (NASDAQ: IBKC), holding company of the 131-year-old IBERIABANK ( www.iberiabank.com ), announced today that it will release first quarter 2018 results along with its 2020 Strategic Goals after the close of business on Thursday, April 19, 2018, and follow with a conference call the next morning.
The first quarter release of earnings, the Company's 2020 Strategic Goals, and related supplemental presentation materials will be distributed after the close of business on Thursday, April 19, 2018, followed by a live conference call, beginning at 8:30 a.m. Central Time on Friday, April 20, 2018. Interested persons may access the conference call by dialing 1-888-317-6003. The confirmation code for the call is 9690151. A replay of the call will be available until midnight Central Time on April 27, 2018, by dialing 1-877-344-7529. The access code for the replay is 10118181.
As of December 31, 2017, IBERIABANK Corporation had total assets equal to $28.0 billion, shareholders' equity of $3.7 billion, and a Common Equity Tier 1 (CET 1) ratio equal to 10.58%. The Company's common stock trades on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol "IBKC." The depositary shares representing interest in shares of non-cumulative Series B perpetual preferred stock trade under the symbol "IBKCP" and the depositary shares for the Series C perpetual preferred stock trade under the symbol "IBKCO."
IBERIABANK Corporation is a regional financial holding company with offices in Louisiana, Arkansas, Tennessee, Alabama, Texas, Florida, Georgia, and South Carolina, offering commercial, private banking, consumer, small business, wealth and trust management, retail brokerage, mortgage, and title insurance services.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/iberiabank-corporation-to-announce-first-quarter-results-and-2020-strategic-goals-300618455.html
SOURCE IBERIABANK Corporation
